description:
## CodeRabbit Suggestion

**Category:** bug
**Priority:** high
**Source PR:** #undefined

### Suggestion Details
Ad-hoc “syntax” checker produces many false positives: The current line-by-line brace counter and “import without export” heuristics will incorrectly fail on perfectly valid modules (e.g., side-effect-only imports, template literals, multiline objects). They also miss real errors such as unmatched braces spanning multiple lines.

### Implementation Notes
- Review the original CodeRabbit suggestion in PR #undefined
- Implement the suggested changes following project coding standards
- Test thoroughly before creating a pull request
- Update this ticket status when work begins and completes

- [ ] Implement suggested changes
- [ ] Add appropriate tests
- [ ] Update documentation if needed
- [ ] Create pull request with changes
- [ ] Verify CodeRabbit approval in new PR
